name: Liza Nguyen
awards:
Award of the International Biennial of Art "Industry and Nature", Lulea, Sweden
,Prize Winner of the Photography Award "Prix Fnac Européen de la Photographie", France
,Prize Winner of the Photography Award "Bourse du Talent" n°23 by Kodak, France
,Special Mention of the "Young Creator Gras-Savoye" Award, RIP, Arles, France

First Price of "HP Invision" photography contest, France
